attributes.action: pay carers the hourly minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: pay carers the minimum hourly rate of pay for the hours they care. Carers work up to 24/7 but are only paid £46.95, paying carers the minimum hourly rate would give them over 4* that amount for the 35hours minimum that has to be done to claim carers allowance

government_responses.details:
